name: Gravicube
description:
Gravicube - a minimalist  strategic puzzle-platform game about switching gravity and interacting with your environment. 

Controls:

WASD to move, IJKL to change gravity. Press R to reset and M to view menu.

How to play:

Collect all yellow keys, then proceed to black doors.  Touch switches to perform a certain change in the environment. Experiment with switches to move objects to complete the level.
